name: Goat of the 8th Layer
description:
Hell just went from Infernal to Radical.

Play as the Demon Queen Lilith, unceremoniously cast into frozen-over depths of Hell and polymorphed by the layer's dark, eldritch magics into a form befitting her true soul-- a goat. She must use her skateboarding skills to climb up and reclaim her throne.

CONTROLS
A and D: Move Left and Right
Spacebar: Jump
Left and Right Arrow Keys: Spin in mid-air (Allows for mid-air acceleration and farther jump distance).
R: Restart at last checkpoint.

(Note: This is a very, very early prototype done over the course of 2 weeks for the My First Game Jam of Summer 2018.)

(Second Note: Stay radical.)
